message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think you'd be interested in. It's worth at least $120 to me, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about $125? That's closer to your offer, and still leaves some room for profit on my end.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here. I'm willing to go down to $122.  That's a fair price, considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $118?
Bob, I'm really trying to make this work, but I can't go any lower than $120. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product. If you're not willing to pay that, I'll have to sell to John.
